content: This is because fighting in the mud will drastically slow any dodge roll you try to make to get out of the way of his attacks. You can alleviate this somewhat with the help of one of the Sages Relic's passive buffs, or a particular gourd soak, but they won't put you back on even footing.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Webbed_Hollow-Lower_Hollow_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'Webbed Hollow - Lower Hollow Walkthrough', specifically from the subsection 'Boss Fight - Zhu Bajie (Second Encounter)'.
The content is as follows:
This is because fighting in the mud will drastically slow any dodge roll you try to make to get out of the way of his attacks. You can alleviate this somewhat with the help of one of the Sages Relic's passive buffs, or a particular gourd soak, but they won't put you back on even footing.
